alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:24PM EDT until July 24 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 424 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Perry, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perry, Lake Bird, Secotan, Boyd, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction and Hampton Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
